articles.title: Firefly Eyes Late February for Return to Flight
articles.summary: Following a mishap in April of 2025, Firefly Aerospace is aiming to return its Alpha rocket to launch on the 28th of February.

articles.title: Harnessing the Sun to Extract Oxygen on the Moon
articles.summary: Light shines onto a solar concentrator being tested in this Aug. 7, 2025, photo. The concentrator is part of the Carbothermal Reduction Demonstration (CaRD) project, which aims to produce oxygen from simulated lunar regolith for use at the Moon’s south pole. articles.title: Hyperion author Dan Simmons dies from stroke at 77
articles.summary: I went into Hyperion blind, decades ago, knowing almost nothing about it. I was never the same.

articles.title: NASA announces major overhaul of Artemis moon program:  “We’ve got to get back to basics”
articles.summary: New NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman announced a major overhaul of the agency's Artemis moon program Friday, acknowledging that the agency's plan to land astronauts on the moon in 2028 was not realistic without another preparatory mission first to lay the groundwork.
